has-public-cloud-deployment-model.context: <system-security-plan xmlns="http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0"> <system-implementation> <inventory-item uuid="600cf59f-633c-49a3-b930-1cd6004844d5"> <prop name="public" value="no"/> </inventory-item> </system-implementation> <system-characteristics> <prop name="cloud-deployment-model" value="other"/> </system-characteristics> </system-security-plan>

scenarios.label: FedRAMP OSCAL SSP Cloud Service and Deployment Models
When a FedRAMP SSP has public components or inventory items, a cloud deployment model of "public-cloud" must be             employed.

has-public-cloud-deployment-model.context: <system-security-plan xmlns="http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0"> <system-implementation> <inventory-item uuid="600cf59f-633c-49a3-b930-1cd6004844d5"> <prop name="public" value="yes"/> </inventory-item> </system-implementation> <system-characteristics> <prop name="cloud-deployment-model" value="public-cloud"/> </system-characteristics> </system-security-plan>

scenarios.label: FedRAMP OSCAL SSP Cloud Service and Deployment Models
